nodes.text: Captain Vrinko was a male Mon Calamari Rebel officer present at the Battle of Restuss, and was in charge of placing antennas in the ruins of the city. He was eventually killed by a group of Imperial soldiers under order from Captain Okto.

Vrinko appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
